PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX dgov: <http://data.gov.be#>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

DELETE 
	{	?dataset dcterms:publisher ?pub .
		?pub ?p ?o }
INSERT 
	{ 	?dataset dcterms:publisher <http://org.belgif.be/cbe/org/0207_343_933#id> .
		<http://org.belgif.be/cbe/org/0207_343_933#id> dgov:org <http://data.gov.be/en/taxonomy/term/363> .
		<http://org.belgif.be/cbe/org/0207_343_933#id> a foaf:Organization .
		<http://org.belgif.be/cbe/org/0207_343_933#id> foaf:name "Stad Luik"@nl .
		<http://org.belgif.be/cbe/org/0207_343_933#id> foaf:name "Ville de Liège"@fr .
		<http://org.belgif.be/cbe/org/0207_343_933#id> foaf:name "City of Liège"@en }
WHERE
	{	?dataset dcterms:publisher ?pub }
